title: Tests fail on MacOS (git-annex cannot create directory)
body:
Specifically 

- `datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_data`
- `datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_push_matching`
- `datalad.distribution.tests.test_get.test_get_recurse_dirs`
- `datalad.distribution.tests.test_install.test_install_recursive_repeat`
- `datalad.distribution.tests.test_get.test_get_multiple_files`
- 

Failure pattern in all cases is similar:

```
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git annex copy --batch -z --to local --fast --json --json-error-messages --json-progress -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3' failed with exitcode 1 under /private/var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_matching76a9fiww/ds [err: 'git-annex: copy: 1 failed'] [errors from JSON records: [['  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_matching76a9fiww/dssibling/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_matching76a9fiww/dssibling/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_matching76a9fiww/dssibling/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  This could have failed because --fast is enabled.']]] [info keys: stdout_json]
```

```
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git annex copy --batch -z --to target --fast --json --json-error-messages --json-progress -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3' failed with exitcode 1 under /private/var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/ds [err: 'git-annex: copy: 3 failed'] [errors from JSON records: [['  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  This could have failed because --fast is enabled.'], ['  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  This could have failed because --fast is enabled.'], ['  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  ../../../../../../../../var/folders/5s/g225f6nd6jl4g8tshbh1ltk40000gn/T/datalad_temp_tree_test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_datauewlscld/target/.git/annex: createDirectory: does not exist (No such file or directory)', '  This could have failed because --fast is enabled.']]] [info keys: stdout_json]
```

@bpoldrack started looking into it. Any advice re peculiarities of this OS would be much appreciated.
